DOC.brief_summary: The present study aim assess quality life patient suffer tension-type headache ( TTH ) treat 4 week different manual therapy-based technique . The study design involve factorial , randomize , double-blind , control study
DOC.brief_title: The Influence Manual Therapy Quality Life Tension-Type Headache
DOC.detailed_description: Object : The present study aim assess quality life patient suffer tension-type headache ( TTH ) treat 4 week different manual therapy-based technique . Methods : The study design involve factorial , randomize , double-blind , control study 76 subject . They divide 4 group : suboccipital inhibitory pressure apply first group ; suboccipital spinal manipulation apply second group ; combination two treatment applied third group ; fourth group control group . Quality life assess use SF-12 questionnaire ( overall different dimension ) begin end treatment , one month follow-up .
DOC.criteria: diagnosed neurologist , headache characteristic establish International Headache Society Controlled pharmacologically . Patients infrequent ETTH , probable frequent infrequent form TTH They never vomit headache episode treatment ETTH patient may experience occasionally photophobia phonophobia episode headache , CTTH patient may experience occasionally photophobia , phonophobia mild nausea headache episode . Pain aggravate movement head , Metabolic musculoskeletal problem similar headache symptom , Previous trauma cervical spine , Active vertigo history Poorly control hypertension , Joint stiffness , atherosclerosis , advance osteoarthritis , Patients undergoing pharmacological adaptation , Excessive emotional stress , Patients heart device Joint instability , Neurological disorder , Laxity cervical soft tissue , Radiographic abnormalities Generalized hyperlaxity hypermobility , Pregnancy .
